ygData.subject: The uniform interface in REST [rest-discuss]
ygData.msgSnippet: Without consulting any writings or people, describe the uniform interface in REST. Consider your effort a charitable act toward a layperson. -- Etan Wexler.

interface in REST. Consider your effort a charitable act toward a
layperson.
